creator: vincent.hardy@sun.com
text:
It would be good to make the list of last visited files (in the Go menu) 
persistent between browser sessions.

creator: tkormann@apache.org
text:
not a priority for Batik and SVG implementation support.
I will do that when I have time.

creator: tkormann@apache.org
text: I don't have time to do that in a near future.

creator: vincent.hardy@sun.com
text:
The last visited URIs are now available in the 'Go' menu.
The uris are saved in the <use-home/.batik/preferences.xml file
along with an integer value defining the maximum number of 
uris which should be kept.
